channel.title: Does docker require base image?
channel.description:
I'm new to Redash and Docker as well so please be patient!
I'm self hosting Redash and I'm told that I need to do this in Docker.
I've installed Docker in Windows Server 2019.
Do I need to install a Windows base image in Docker? Do I need to install a Linux base image in Docker eg. ubuntu?
Thanks for any help.

item.title: Does docker require base image?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Hey there and welcome to the forum! So sorry for this late response. Not sure how I missed it

Did you solve this issue?

Read full topic
